title: Charming One-Bedroom Apartment with Modern Green Features in Ustka's Port District
description: Welcome to your new home near the serene shores of Ustka! This inviting one-bedroom apartment offers a comfortable, contemporary feel with 63 sqm of well-organized living space, including two full bathrooms for extra convenience. Large windows fill the open-plan living and dining area with natural light, perfect for both relaxing and working from home. Carefully selected amenities like underfloor heating and sleek, energy-efficient appliances promote year-round comfort and savings.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Port District, this apartment is surrounded by Ustka's historic charm and maritime heritage. The tranquil streets offer a peaceful, safe environment, making it ideal for those seeking a quieter life with access to nature's beauty and balance. Cycle along scenic bike lines or enjoy easy escapades to nearby beaches and countryside, while the main highway provides quick connections for weekend explorers.
lifestyle_benefits: airy and peaceful setting ideal for remote work
low utility costs through green solutions
steps to harbor front and nature paths
simple access to regional highways and cycling trails
target_buyer: Perfect for a solo professional, a couple, or a young family looking for a sustainable and inspiring remote work setting by the Baltic Sea.
market_positioning: An attractively priced, future-ready home combining the tranquility of a historic seaside town with the ease and efficiency demanded in today's lifestyle-oriented real estate market.
